type IDomainManager<'Data (requires 'Data : null and 'Data :> ITableData)> = interface
generic <typename TData> where TData : class, ITableDatapublic interface class IDomainManager

Docs.summary: Provides an abstraction for accessing a backend store for a . The abstraction can be implemented in one of two ways depending on the capabilities of the backend store. Stores that support a -based model can implement the and methods whereas stores that don't support directly or where it is not the preferred way of accessing them can implement the and methods.

Docs.summary: Looks up a single item in the backend store.
Docs.returns: A representing the result of the lookup. A represents an containing zero or one entities. This allows it to be composed with further querying such as $select.
Docs.remarks: See also which is the companion method for executing a query for multiple items.

Docs.summary: Updates an existing item by applying a patch to it. The abstraction keeps track of which properties have changed which avoids problems with default values and the like.
